comments: Hardaway Jr. (DAL) immediately slides his hand off of Podziemski's (GSW) side and marginal contact occurs during the pick.
Replay review of the goaltend called on Washington (DAL) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. It is confirmed that Washington (DAL) commits a defensive goaltending violation.
Green (GSW) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Green (GSW) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Gafford (DAL) prior to any incidental arm contact occurring during the shot attempt near the rim.
Gafford (DAL) grabs and pulls Green's (GSW) jersey during his drive, affecting his SQBR.
Irving (DAL) moves alongside Green's (GSW) path and marginal body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Wiggins (GSW) immediately slides his hand off of Gafford's (DAL) side and marginal contact occurs during the pick.
Doncic (DAL) places his off-arm against Wiggins (GSW) and releases from the contact.
Doncic (DAL) reaches in and marginal contact occurs with Wiggins' (GSW) shoulder during the drive.
Kleber (DAL) makes clean contact with the ball, prior to any incidental arm contact occurring as he contests Thompson's (GSW) shot attempt near the rim.
Although Green's (GSW) arms are in a vertical position, he jumps A to B into Irving's (DAL) body and initiates contact that affects his driving shot attempt.
Kleber (DAL) steps into Thompson's (GSW) body and initiates illegal contact that affects his SQBR as he attempts to make the pass.
Thompson (GSW) defends Washington (DAL) in the post and upon reaching in, marginal contact occurs.
Irving's (DAL) shot attempt goes out of bounds.
